name: Capitalia
startIntroPart1: Ladies and gentlemen, survivors of the Cataclysm that brought our world to its knees, I stand before you today as a beacon of hope, a symbol of resilience, and a testament to the indomitable human spirit. We have endured unimaginable hardships, witnessed the collapse of our once-thriving civilization, and faced the brink of annihilation.
startIntroPart2: But here we are, survivors, united in our determination to rebuild what was lost and forge a new future. The story of our civilization will not end with destruction; instead, it will be defined by our ability to survive, rebuild, and thrive. Thank you, and let us embark on this remarkable journey together.
declaringWar: Resources are scarce, our people must survive.
attacked: A foolish action that you will come to regret.
defeated: With heavy hearts and the weight of responsibility, I hereby declare the surrender of Capitalia, acknowledging the need for peace and the preservation of our people!
introduction: Greetings, fellow survivors of the Cataclysm. I am the Praefectus, leader of Capitalia. We as a people, are inherently peaceful, and we hope you are too.
neutralHello: Greetings, have you come to trade??
tradeRequest: Capitalia is known for its remarkable preservation of resources, yet we do not have everything we need. We wish to negotiate a trade.
